amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, And Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.para: Sections 13-901 to 13-928 shall be known and may be cited as the Political Subdivisions Tort Claims Act.

annotation.para: The Political Subdivisions Tort Claims Act provides for interaction between that act and the Nebraska Hospital-Medical Liability Act. Jacobson v. Shresta, 21 Neb. App. 102, 838 N.W.2d 19 (2013).
